title: Rolls-Royce achieves new milestone towards world’s ‘fastest’ all-electric aircraft
lead: The taxiing of the plane is a critical test of the integration of the aircraft’s propulsion system, ahead of actual flight-testing, which has been planned for the Spring

title: Digitizing utility bill management affects every player
lead: Taking the decision to digitize the management of utility bills is a big step in reducing the administrative burden of bill processing in your organization.

title: IEA: Global CO2 emissions rising again after ‘unprecedented’ fall in 2020
lead: In December 2020, global emissions were 2% higher than they were in the same month a year earlier, new report finds

title: Slots waiver extended to tackle carbon-intensive ‘ghost flights’
lead: The measure allows airlines to keep their rights to slots even if they don’t operate flights at least 80% of the time

title: Aussie carbon capture projects bag AUD$50m boost
lead: Carbon recycling is among the eligible technologies that will secure a share from the fund

title: Eni closes acquisition of Dogger Bank stake
lead: The Italian oil and gas major has purchased a 20% share in Dogger Bank A and B

title: Sainsbury’s to sponsor COP26
lead: The retailer becomes the sixth Principal Partner for the international climate change summit in Glasgow

title: Drax starts planning process to build bioenergy with CCS plants
lead: The company has started the application to build BECCS units as soon as 2024

title: ENA brings more flexibility to the grid with contract update
lead: A new contract aims to offer more liquidity in local markets and bring energy bills down

title: Plans for ‘England’s first’ poo-powered heating scheme unveiled
lead: More than 2,000 homes in Kingston could soon be heated using sewage
